Class StanzaProperties | Methods | Events
 
Packagecom.splunk.services.properties
Classpublic class Stanza
InheritanceStanza flash.events.EventDispatcher

The Stanza class is used to retrieve a stanza from a particular configuration file.


Public Properties
 PropertyDefined by
  file : ConfigFile
[read-only] The ConfigFile instance that this Stanza object connects to.
Stanza

[read-only] The list of Key objects received from the load operation.

[read-only] The name of this stanza.

Events
 EventSummaryDefined by
  
close
Dispatched if the connection is closed before the load operation is complete.Stanza
  
complete
Dispatched after the load operation is complete.Stanza
  
error
Dispatched if an error occurs that terminates the load operation.Stanza

Dispatched when a load operation starts.Stanza

Dispatched as the load operation progresses.Stanza
Property detail
fileproperty
file:ConfigFile  [read-only]

The ConfigFile instance that this Stanza object connects to. This value corresponds to the value of the file parameter specified in the constructor.

Implementation
    public function get file():ConfigFile

See also

ConfigFile
keysproperty 
keys:Object  [read-only]

The list of Key objects received from the load operation. This property is populated only when the load operation is complete.

Implementation
    public function get keys():Object

See also

Key
nameproperty 
name:String  [read-only]

The name of this stanza. This value corresponds to the value of the name parameter specified in the constructor.

Implementation
    public function get name():String
Constructor detail
Stanza()constructor
public function Stanza(file:ConfigFile, name:String)

Creates a new Stanza object.

Parameters
file:ConfigFile — The ConfigFile instance from which to retrieve a stanza.
 
name:String — The name of the stanza to retrieve.

Throws
— The value of the file parameter is null or the value of the name parameter is empty.

See also

ConfigFile
Method detail
close()method
public function close():void

Closes the load operation in progress.

load()method 
public function load():void

Loads a stanza from the associated ConfigFile instance. If a stanza is already loading, the load operation is closed.

Event detail
closeevent 
Event object type: com.splunk.services.events.ServiceEvent
ServiceEvent.type property = com.splunk.services.events.ServiceEvent.CLOSE

Dispatched if the connection is closed before the load operation is complete.

Defines the value of the type property of a close event object.

This event has the following properties:

PropertyValue
bubblesfalse
cancelablefalse; there is no default behavior to cancel.
currentTargetThe object that is actively processing the Event object with an event listener.
targetThe object whose connection has been closed.

See also

close()
completeevent  
Event object type: com.splunk.services.events.ServiceEvent
ServiceEvent.type property = com.splunk.services.events.ServiceEvent.COMPLETE

Dispatched after the load operation is complete.

Defines the value of the type property of a complete event object.

This event has the following properties:

PropertyValue
bubblesfalse
cancelablefalse; there is no default behavior to cancel.
currentTargetThe object that is actively processing the Event object with an event listener.
targetThe object that has completed loading.

See also

keys
load()
errorevent  
Event object type: com.splunk.services.events.ServiceErrorEvent
ServiceErrorEvent.type property = com.splunk.services.events.ServiceErrorEvent.ERROR

Dispatched if an error occurs that terminates the load operation.

Defines the value of the type property of an error event object.

This event has the following properties:

PropertyValue
bubblesfalse
cancelablefalse; there is no default behavior to cancel.
currentTargetThe object that is actively processing the Event object with an event listener.
targetThe object experiencing an error.
textText to be displayed as an error message.
errorTypeThe specific type of error that occurred.

See also

load()
openevent  
Event object type: com.splunk.services.events.ServiceEvent
ServiceEvent.type property = com.splunk.services.events.ServiceEvent.OPEN

Dispatched when a load operation starts.

Defines the value of the type property of an open event object.

This event has the following properties:

PropertyValue
bubblesfalse
cancelablefalse; there is no default behavior to cancel.
currentTargetThe object that is actively processing the Event object with an event listener.
targetThe object that has opened a connection.

See also

load()
progressevent  
Event object type: com.splunk.services.events.ServiceProgressEvent
ServiceProgressEvent.type property = com.splunk.services.events.ServiceProgressEvent.PROGRESS

Dispatched as the load operation progresses.

Defines the value of the type property of a progress event object.

This event has the following properties:

PropertyValue
bubblesfalse
cancelablefalse; there is no default behavior to cancel.
currentTargetThe object that is actively processing the Event object with an event listener.
targetThe object reporting progress.
bytesLoadedThe number of items or bytes loaded at the time the listener processes the event.
bytesTotalThe total number of items or bytes that ultimately will be loaded if the loading process succeeds.

See also

load()
